forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 45. North wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the early morning hours give way to dawn, Downtown San Francisco awakens under a mostly clear sky, the air crisp and invigorating with a low temperature nestled around 45 degrees. A gentle north wind stirs quietly, whispering across the city as it preps for the sun's ascent. Saturday promises sunshine, a flicker of warmth eyeing a peak of about 55 degrees, though the afternoon will see temperatures slip slightly to a cool embrace around 52. The wind will remain soft, brushing the buildings with a west-northwest charm at speeds of 6 to 10 mph.

Although the forecast predicts a lack of fog, its subtle presence may still linger far off as the marine layer dances along the horizon. The day exhibits a casual radiance, perhaps unfurling invitations to stroll through local neighborhoods or indulge in the serenity of waterfront views. To embrace the crisp air comfortably, layering becomes a wise choice; perhaps a light sweater over a tee, paired with comfortable shoes suitable for an unhurried exploration of the city’s vibrant streets. As the sun begins to assert itself, a warm drink in hand could augment the experience, whether it leads you to a local café or a quiet park bench, all under the watchful gaze of the magnificent skyline.
